title: FS 1909-11 T206 White Border Gordon Hickman, Mobile, Southern League

posts.post_title: FS 1909-11 T206 White Border Gordon Hickman, Mobile, Southern League
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1909-11 T206 White Border of Gordon Hickman, Mobile Southern League, for sale. Nice clean card except for the corner damage lower right corner.

Price: $100.00 delivered.

Payment: Paypal (F/F), check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
